title: fried buttermilk chicken with tomato salsa
description: This is proper Saturday-night dinner territory - serve it on giant sharing plates so that all the family can dive in.
ingredients: 1 whole chicken, jointed, then cut into 10 portions
1 unwaxed lemon, finely grated zest only
2 tbsp roughly chopped fresh flatleaf parsley leaves
salt and freshly ground black pepper
